1561650.name: Fiend's Isle Demo
1561650.description:
Fiend's Isle is an action roguelike inspired by retro first person RPGs of the 90s. Explore procedurally generated levels, fight monsters, and uncover the secrets of the mysterious island. Demo includes a preview of the first level of the game.

Fiend's Isle is in active development, so be sure to add it to your wishlist and follow for updates!
